blogPost.excerpt: Polotno Studio is a design editor. Use the large library of photos and vector illustrations to create images for social media, youtube previews, covers, presentations.
blogPost.body: Polotno Studio is a design editor. Use the large library of photos and vector illustrations to create images for social media, youtube previews, covers, presentations.
blogPost.title: Polotno Studio - Canva-like design editor. No signups, no ads, no paywalls.
blogPost.author: Anton Lavrenov

localize.description: Polotno Studio是一款设计编辑器。使用大量的照片和矢量插图库，为社交媒体、youtube预览、封面、演示文稿创建图像。
localize.tagline: 类似Canva的设计编辑器。没有注册，没有广告，没有付费墙。

localize.description: Polotno Studio是一款設計編輯器。使用大量的照片和矢量插圖庫，爲社交媒體、youtube預覽、封面、演示文稿創建圖像。
localize.tagline: 類似Canva的設計編輯器。沒有註冊，沒有廣告，沒有付費牆。

previous.excerpt: Your resume is the most important part of your job search, but also one of the hardest to get right. Rezi makes it easy for you with our AI-powered resume builder that generates perfect resume content for you. TL;DR: Nice
